name: Espresso
description: A strong, full-bodied coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.
making_process: Brewed using an espresso machine with high pressure and hot water.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.
making_process: Prepare a shot of espresso, add steamed milk, and top with a thick layer of milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of foam.
making_process: Brew espresso, pour steamed milk, and add a small layer of foam on top.

name: Americano
description: A simple coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water, creating a smooth and mellow flavor.
making_process: Add hot water to a shot of espresso.

name: Mocha
description: An espresso topped with a small amount of frothy milk foam, creating a strong, bold taste.
making_process: Brew espresso and add a dollop of foamed milk.

name: Macchiato
description: A rich blend of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.
making_process: Mix espresso with chocolate syrup, add steamed milk, and top with whipped cream.

name: Flat White
description: A coffee made with microfoam milk poured over a shot of espresso, creating a velvety texture.
making_process: Pour microfoam milk over freshly brewed espresso.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso, blending hot and cold flavors.
making_process: Pour a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth, refreshing coffee brewed slowly with cold water for a rich flavor.
making_process: Steep coarsely ground coffee in cold water for 12-24 hours, then strain.

name: Affogato
description: A cold version of a latte, made with espresso and cold milk, served over ice.
making_process: Combine espresso and cold milk, pour over ice, and stir.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A frothy, blended iced coffee drink made with instant coffee, water, and sugar.
making_process: Blend instant coffee, water, sugar, and ice until frothy.

name: Frappuccino
description: A thick, unfiltered coffee made by boiling finely ground coffee with water and sugar in a cezve pot.
making_process: Boil water with finely ground coffee and sugar in a cezve pot, then serve unfiltered.
